author: Schwanowski
body:
## Steps to reproduce

```
Not possible to reproduce

```

## Expected behavior

No Crash

## Actual behavior

Random Crashs

## Environment data


```
Powershell 7.2 with VS Code. Im using an portable installation of powershell 7.2 (not the msi packages).

Windows Server x64

```

![Unbenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34173158/100162773-ac060a00-2eb4-11eb-8a3d-26330a4e1536.PNG)

Hi There,

im experiencing random crashs in Powershell V7.2. They became very rare in 7.2 while they have been more frequent in 7.0 and 7.1.

I have experienced one crash in 7.2. and attached the error message. Do you have any idea, what might cause the crash?

Thanks,

Alex

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @Schwanowski PowerShell works well on _clean_ system. So the issue comes from specific of your environment. What is version of the server? What apps have you installed? What (file, registry) permissions have you changed? Only you can find a root of the issue - install clean system and configure step by step checking the issue on every step.

comments.author: Schwanowski
comments.body: Ok thank you. As I have no control over the envrionment I will close the issue

comments.author: doctordns
comments.body: This is a VS Code problem - I have seen it happen albeit rarely.

title: Random Crahs in Powershell 7+ (also in 7.2)
